translation.en: Serena? Serena? Hey, excuse me!
translation.ja: セレーナ！　セレーナ？ 聞きなさい

translation.en: You told me you did your math homework. You lied to me again. Why?
translation.ja: 算数の宿題したって　ウソね

translation.en: I can't do it. And I don't get why I have to.
Jesse didn't even finish college, and he's the greatest singer who ever lived.
translation.ja: ジェシーは大学中退でも 最高の歌い手

translation.en: [chuckles] Yeah, well…
Jesse may not have finished college, but he finished the third grade.
translation.ja: 小学３年の勉強は 修了したわ

translation.en: Serena, we had an agreement.
-Any more unfinished homework-- -No!
translation.ja: ほかの宿題は？ いや

translation.en: -I'm sorry. -[sobbing] I have to go to that concert.
translation.ja: 悪いけど… 絶対コンサートに行く

translation.en: -Dad? -[Tom] Hmm. Mummy said I can't go to Jesse's concert.
translation.ja: ママが コンサートはダメって

translation.en: Tell her… tell her to give me a second chance.
translation.ja: もう一度 考え直して

translation.en: Serena, you promised your mother.
-[Serena] Math makes my stomach hurt. -Thank you.
Jesse is life.
What if she does it this morning before school?
Tom, Serena and I had an agreement. -Remember? -Come on, Mom.
translation.ja: トム… セレーナ 同意したわね

translation.en: It's Jesse.
I'll tell you what.
translation.ja: そうだ 今すぐ 宿題して

translation.en: Get the homework done right now, don't lie to your mother again,
translation.ja: そうだ 今すぐ 宿題して 二度とウソつかない

translation.en: ace your next quiz, which I know you can do,
and we'll all go to Jesse as a family, front row seats.
translation.ja: 家族で行こう 最前列を取るよ

translation.en: Sold out. There are no front row seats.
One of the perks of being District Attorney… Connections.
translation.ja: 州検事は激務だけど コネがある

translation.en: [Tom] All right. Come here.
I'm on it.
♪ This is how we move ♪
♪ Everybody, everybody want To have… ♪
translation.ja: みんな みんな   楽しみたい

translation.en: Carefree days of youth.
Tom… Come on.
She lies, and the consequence is front row seats?
translation.ja: ウソに対してごほうび？

translation.en: She deserves to have a childhood.
She deserves to be ready for adulthood.
[sighing] I was at work, never getting to see her. I don't want to be the bad guy.
translation.ja: 仕事で一緒にいる時間もない 悪役は嫌なんだ

translation.en: Which makes it my job? You get to be cool dad.
translation.ja: 私が悪役を引き受けるの？

translation.en: She has a wild soul like you. And I don't ever want her to lose that.
translation.ja: 母親似で自由奔放な性格を 潰したくない

translation.en: I love her soul. I'm not trying to crush it.
translation.ja: 潰すつもりはないけど

translation.en: But there's such a thing as too wild.
I hear you. And I understand. We'll figure it out. -Yeah. -Like we always do.
translation.ja: いつものように ふたりで解決しよう

translation.en: Just back me up from now on. Okay?
[Tom] Always.
Seriously.
I couldn't be…
-More serious. -You're so bad.
translation.ja: いつも以上にまじめ 悪い人ね

translation.en: We now go to the capital.
translation.ja: 〝殺人事件に 第三の犠牲者〞 最新の展開です

translation.en: We're following the killer's third brutal strike in ten days.
translation.ja: 〝殺人事件に 第三の犠牲者〞 〝殺人事件に 第三の犠牲者〞 10日間で ３件の殺人に対し―

translation.en: The Governor had this response.
translation.ja: 知事が声明を出します

translation.en: I'm confident that the legislature will support me at last
translation.ja: 立法府は私の意見を支持し―

translation.en: in taking the necessary steps to end the moratorium on executions.
translation.ja: 死刑再開の 手続きを取るはずです

translation.en: Well, down the rabbit hole I go.
[Laura] I heard the case is ripped open.
-For starters. -Morning.
-[Tom] Morning, Barry. -Morning, Barry.
translation.ja: おはよう バリー おはよう

translation.en: [Barry] Good morning, sweetheart.
Serena is in math homework jail,
so don't let her con you into any detours on the way home from school.
translation.ja: 学校の帰り 寄り道させないで

translation.en: [Governor DeKizer on TV] Criminals live in fear.
It's time to strike back with the most powerful deterrent we have.
translation.ja: 究極の抑止力を使わねば

translation.en: Should the moratorium be lifted?
The first inmate to be executed will be Danny Jackson,
translation.ja: ダニー・ジャクソンです

translation.en: convicted of three murders in Spanish Harbor ten years ago.
The case made a stir because Jackson's own brother was the star witness
translation.ja: 実兄が検察側の証人となり 物議を醸しました

translation.en: -for the prosecution. -[Ruby] Grandma?
translation.ja: 実兄が検察側の証人となり 物議を醸しました お父さんがテレビに？

translation.en: Why is my dad on TV?
-Are they going to kill my dad? -No, no, no.
Sweetheart…
I… You promised they were never going to.
I swear to you on my own life, I will never let them hurt my baby.
translation.ja: もちろん 誓うわ そんなことさせない

translation.en: [newscaster] Jackson should be found not guilty on the grounds that he suffers
translation.ja: 知的障害のため― 無罪と思われましたが

translation.en: from a genetic disorder linked to intellectual disability.
translation.ja: 無罪と思われましたが

translation.en: But the state argued successfully that his disability was not a factor in the crimes.
translation.ja: 州裁判所は 障害は犯罪要因でないと主張

translation.en: [news announcer] This week on Most Wanted, City By the Bay, three murders, zero leads.
translation.ja: 今週は 連続殺人事件を追います

translation.en: For the third time in a week and a half, a young woman stabbed to death.
translation.ja: ３人目の被害者 若い女性が刺し殺されました

translation.en: Once again, the killer signs his work in blood.
translation.ja: 犯人は血の目印を残しました

translation.en: Go to the other cam.
[newscaster 2] …signs of grisly struggle.
-A mangled body abandoned… -[Mara] Boss.
Did we get the extra five minutes?
Well, it was either border war in Pakistan, the funeral of a US Senator,
translation.ja: パキスタン国境戦争か 上院議員の葬儀か

translation.en: the governor's shortlist of candidates to replace him--
translation.ja: 次期知事候補だったけど

translation.en: Or dead bodies in dumpsters all over town.
-On our tombstones, Mara. -[chuckles] We bled, we led.
translation.ja: “血を流して導く”が 番組の鉄則

translation.en: Ready to help the cops bag another one?
Look who's starring on Channel 5.
[Tom] Yes, ten years ago, I prosecuted Danny Jackson for all three murders.
translation.ja: 10年前に ジャクソンを起訴しました

translation.en: So, no regrets, Mr. Price?
translation.ja: 後悔ありませんか？ 〝プライス州検事〞

translation.en: If the moratorium's lifted, you have total faith
translation.ja: 〝プライス州検事〞 〝プライス州検事〞 無実の人間が 死刑になるかも知れません

translation.en: that you won't be sending an innocent man to their death?
translation.ja: 無実の人間が 死刑になるかも知れません

translation.en: Well, I have total faith in the gifted defense attorneys
who've given everything they've got to making sure
this man had the full benefit of due process and the law.
translation.ja: 意義ある法手続を施行します

translation.en: Thank you, Michelle.
[Grace] Mr. Price…
[Tom] You will hear the defense make much of Mr. Jackson's limited intellectual capacity.
translation.ja: 弁護側はジャクソン氏の 知的能力を盾にしました

translation.en: But… he had the intelligence to lie in wait for Carina Markovich.
translation.ja: カリーナさんを待ち伏せ ウソをつく知性があった

translation.en: To put on the gloves with which he strangled the life out of Janice Kim.
translation.ja: ジャニスさんを絞殺するとき 手袋をしました

translation.en: To stalk Susanna Spencer, his brother's fiancée
translation.ja: 兄の婚約者スザンナをつけ―

translation.en: -the night he slaughtered her. -It's not true.
translation.ja: 殺しました 警察のでっち上げよ

translation.en: The police lied.
-It's not true! They lied! -You shouldn't be here, Mrs. Jackson.
translation.ja: ウソ！ ジャクソンさん

translation.en: I have files to show you.
In the line-up for the first victim, Danny was the only Caucasian.
translation.ja: 最初の犯人識別で 白人はダニーのみ

translation.en: In the second line-up, he was three and a half inches shorter than all the other suspects.
translation.ja: ２件目の容疑者は ダニー以外は長身

translation.en: Ma'am, would you step back, please?
I'm very sorry, Mrs. Jackson.
I'm running for your mum's dry cleaning, and you know the cleaning day rules,
translation.ja: ドライクリーニング回収に 行くよ

translation.en: so don't party too hard, okay?
translation.ja: 留守の間 パーティーしないで

translation.en: Don't worry. I'll only have 100 friends over.
translation.ja: 友達は100人しか招待しない

translation.en: -[Serena laughing] -I'll be right back.
What's up, Tiger Lily?
Hi, Angel.
[Nico on the phone] Does your husband think he can just not pay?
translation.ja: 旦那の借金はどうした？

translation.en: Who is this?
Get home quick with the whole 60k. Serena's waiting for her mother.
translation.ja: ６万ドル持って帰宅しな セレーナが待ってる 警官は呼ぶな

translation.en: And cops? Not such a good idea.
translation.ja: セレーナが待ってる 警官は呼ぶな

translation.en: You have ten minutes.
Dance break!
[Serena] Aye, aye, Captain Nico!
[Laura] Hey!
[Laura] Get away from my daughter.
Captain Nico says if you borrow money, it's bad not to pay it back.
translation.ja: ニコ警部が借金を 返しましょうって

translation.en: [Nico] Truly it was… it was just an honest mistake.
I apologize.
Inspector Kupner, please acquaint this man with the concept of wasted breath.
translation.ja: カプナー捜査官 取り調べをお願い

translation.en: We are licensed investigators legally collecting a debt for a Mr. Davidson Norris.
translation.ja: 私たち調査員の目的は ノリス氏の借金回収

translation.en: It's not our fault nobody told our client the guy moved.
translation.ja: 転居を知りませんでした

translation.en: The only relevant fact here is that this man broke into my home
translation.ja: 関係ないわ この男は家に押し入った

translation.en: and terrified my eight-year-old daughter.
I wasn't scared for one second. We were having the best time ever.
translation.ja: 怖くなかった とっても楽しかった

translation.en: [Cupcake] We'll take care of it from here, Mrs. Price.
Let's not tell Daddy about this. Okay? It'll only upset him.
Don't worry, Captain Nico, I will save you.
translation.ja: 心配ないわ ニコ警部を救出する

translation.en: [Laura] Okay, come on. Let's go, sweetie.
Stop thinking with your head, Cupcake.
Think with that big, bleeding heart of yours.
translation.ja: 大きなハートで感じろ

translation.en: Think about what this would do to her parole.
Don't do this, Nico.
One teeny, tiny tap on "Delete,"
translation.ja: "削除"キーをそっと押せ 覚えてるだろ

translation.en: and just like you getting to second base with Heidi Wilson
translation.ja: "削除"キーをそっと押せ 覚えてるだろ ８年生のハイディの 橋渡しした

translation.en: in eighth grade, this never happened.
translation.ja: ８年生のハイディの 橋渡しした

translation.en: That totally happened.
Not according to Heidi, it didn't.
Muscling deadbeats for cash? You?
translation.ja: 借金の取り立て屋とはね

translation.en: [Sarneau] Hello, Nico.
Hola, Captain Sarneau.
What's the illustrious former detective being charged with?
Unlawful entry.
[Sarneau] Enjoy your stay, Nico.
-[Nico exhales heavily] -[sighs]
What are you inhaling?
Cold sweat dripping from the perp, right before he caves.
translation.ja: 怯える犯罪者の冷汗や―

translation.en: Rust on the badge after a rainy stakeout. Dust gathering on overtime requests.
translation.ja: 雨降り後のさびたバッジ 残業の書類に積るチリ

translation.en: The sweet, musty aromas of my old life.
translation.ja: 昔の生活の甘い香りがする

translation.en: You wishin' you had it back?
That would be a prize-winning waste of time.
Right at that desk, Nico.
Me, looking at five years for soliciting and possession.
translation.ja: 不法侵入ほう助で５年ね

translation.en: You cutting me loose for reasons I've yet to fathom.
[Sarneau] So…
I am expected to believe that totally by some random coincidence,
translation.ja: 誰も信じるわけない まったく偶然に―

translation.en: you just happened to break into the loft of the prosecutor who put your brother on death row?
translation.ja: 弟を死刑囚にした検事の 住居に侵入した？

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: なんだって？　あの女が…

translation.en: -That woman was-- -Mrs. Thomas Price.
translation.ja: なんだって？　あの女が… トム・プライスの夫人

translation.en: You know what, don't insult the distant memory of our friendship
translation.ja: 古い友情を侮辱するの？

translation.en: by pretending like you didn't know. Okay?
Look, whatever hellish game you are up to here, you take it to another precinct.
translation.ja: あなたの悪企みは 次元を超えてる

translation.en: A million people in this city, what are the chances?
translation.ja: この大都市でそんな偶然が？

translation.en: Apparently 100%, because that's what happened.
[Ruby] How long do we have to keep waiting for?
[Grace] Till the person I need to see comes home.
translation.ja: ある人が帰宅するまで

translation.en: Jesse!
[Grace] Ruby, no!
[Ruby] That's my favorite song!
[Serena] Mine too!
I bet it will go triple platinum.
Oh, my God. Where did you get that backpack from? It's so beautiful!
translation.ja: そのリュック！ どこで買えるの？

translation.en: Take it. I have, like, 50 backpacks.
Thank you! My name is Ruby.
translation.ja: ありがとう　私はルビー

translation.en: And I have 16 p11 .2 Deletion Syndrome, but we all have something, right?
translation.ja: 欠失症候群 16P11.2の持病あり 持病なんて普通

translation.en: What's your name and what do you have?
Serena Price, and I have an allergy.
translation.ja: セレーナ・プライス アレルギー持ち

translation.en: Mrs. Price, could you give this to your husband, please?
translation.ja: プライスさん ご主人に渡して

translation.en: These are files regarding the case of my son, Danny Jackson.
translation.ja: ダニー・ジャクソンの 調書です

translation.en: I'm sorry, you have to contact his office.
Message me at @JesseIsGod!
[Laura] Sweetie, we have to go.
Ruby's funny, she's nice.
And she loves Jesse way more than I do. Which I didn't think was possible.
translation.ja: なんと 私よりジェシーが好きなの

translation.en: Why can't I call her?
Because her grandmother…
Her grandmother what?
Ah, Serena, you have ten math problems due by tomorrow.
translation.ja: 明日までに算数しなきゃ

translation.en: And spelling, and you haven't even started.
-[Serena sighs] -So… Let's get focused.
translation.ja: だから集中してやろうね

translation.en: Can I call her after I'm done?
Focus.
Serena.
Snack time, Angel, hardworking…
[Ruby] Mr. Debray, Mr. Debray, Mr. Debray. This is Serena.
translation.ja: デブレイ先生！ セレーナよ

translation.en: Serena, this is my favorite teacher, Mr. Debray.
translation.ja: デブレイ先生！ セレーナよ 一番好きな先生

translation.en: Well, we're glad you're here, Serena.
Oh. Okay. Hey, thank you for being Ruby's friend.
translation.ja: ルビーと友達に なってくれてありがとう

translation.en: -Have fun. -[Ruby] Dance time.
translation.ja: 楽しんで ダンスの時間！

translation.en: Serena.
Do you have any idea how frightened I was?
I think it'll be better if you didn't see Serena anymore.
translation.ja: 会わないほうがいいわ

translation.en: Please, don't go.
Oh, do not grab my daughter.
Are you okay?
Look what you did. It was her father's.
It was the most important thing in the world for her.
translation.ja: 彼女の一番大事な物を

translation.en: Everything okay here?
I'm sorry. I'm sorry the camera's broken.
translation.ja: カメラ壊して ごめんなさい

translation.en: I'll fix it and I'll bring it back to the school, okay?
You did notice she wasn't a student here, right?
Right. I'm right here, Ruby. I'm right here.
translation.ja: しっかりして ルビー

translation.en: I'm not going with you.
Come here.
[Laura] Don't ever, ever do this again. How'd you even get there?
We took the bus, just like a billion people do every day.
translation.ja: バスで みんな使ってる

translation.en: Serena, the city is a very dangerous…
[Laura] The tire blew.
That was cool.
But, don't ever try that again, okay?
translation.ja: 二度としなくていいから

translation.en: I'll have the tire changed in two minutes. You okay?
translation.ja: すぐに修理が終わる 大丈夫？

translation.en: -Mmm-hmm. -All right.
[Laura] Thanks for letting me use your phone.
Is she her daughter?
Yes, she is.
She's beautiful.
Where is she?
It's such a lovely store.
I don't know why I never noticed it before.
translation.ja: 今まで気づかなかった

translation.en: There's something I'd like to give you, an old-fashioned photograph.
translation.ja: 旧式のカメラがあるの

translation.en: Would you like one?
Yes, please.
[Laura] It's lovely. Thank you so much.
You will soon lose something more precious to you than anything in the whole world.
translation.ja: あなたは世界で 一番大切なものを失う

translation.en: Water will take it away. That is your fate,
written in stone a million years before you were born.
translation.ja: 100万年前から 決まっている運命

translation.en: It's late. We better get going--
Fate is your enemy. You can't flee from her.
translation.ja: 運命は敵 逃れられない

translation.en: The only way is to fight her head-on.
But you cannot win until the price is paid.
translation.ja: 代償を払うまで勝てない

translation.en: For one to live, one must die.
-Who has to die? -Come on, sweetheart. Let's go.
translation.ja: 死ぬのは誰？ 行きましょう

translation.en: Serena, get in the car. Come on.
Nothing is a coincidence. Everything is connected.
translation.ja: 偶然の一致はない すべてつながり合う

translation.en: [Jenny] Don't sleep too long. You got pictures to take.
Rich wife plus lying, cheating husband equals this month's rent.
translation.ja: 富豪の妻の旦那は浮気男 稼げるわ

translation.en: Siesta first. [sighs]
I don't know why you put that up.
translation.ja: “お願い　ニコを自由に” これは？

translation.en: A reminder that even the icy heart of a police captain can be melted,
translation.ja: 冷血な警部も説得された

translation.en: and that even the pure heart of a little girl can be conned
into thinking that Nico Jackson's ass is worth saving.
translation.ja: 救われたことを 思い出すためよ

translation.en: She does have a way with glitter.
I'm waking you up in half an hour. -Yeah. -Keep your phone on.
translation.ja: 昼寝は30分 携帯はそのままで

translation.en: Don't judge me.
[Grace] Nico, are you in there?
[Nico] Hey, Mom.
Uncle Nico, Uncle Nico, Uncle Nico!
Ah, you're getting heavy.
-Mom-- -Did you hear what the governor said--
Hey, Ruby, want to run grab yourself a soda from the fridge?
Oh, man, you bet.
Do it!
Yes. I heard what the governor said.
translation.ja: 知事の声明を聞いたよ

translation.en: -[whispering] You know Danny. -Mom…
He loved Susanna like you did, and the others… He could never--
translation.ja: 無実よ スザンナを殺してない

translation.en: The blood on the clothes, the knife.
-The confessions. -Please. -You gotta stop. -Call the judge.
translation.ja: 武器も見つかり自白もある

translation.en: Tell him it was dark that night, you're not sure what you saw.
Mom!
Just visit him…
before…
Hey, I have some work I have to get back to, okay?
translation.ja: 仕事を片付けないと いけないが

translation.en: But I want you to visit me again, all right, Ruby Tuesday?
translation.ja: また来てくれ　ルビー

translation.en: Goodbye, Uncle Nico.
Potatoes?
-[both] Fries. -[Ruby laughs]
[Danny] I killed her.
[Tom] Who did he say was responsible for Susanna's death?
translation.ja: スザンナを殺したのは？

translation.en: What did your brother say when you saw him with the body?
translation.ja: お弟さんは 死体のそばで何と？

translation.en: Mr. Jackson…
[Tom and Serena] ♪ Happy birthday, dear Mommy ♪
translation.ja: ハッピーバースデー   ディア ママ

translation.en: ♪ Happy birthday to you ♪
translation.ja: ハッピーバースデー    ツーユー

translation.en: -[Tom laughing] -[Laura] Aww!
[Tom] Yay!
Make a wish before you say anything and it will come true.
It already has.
You say that every year.
Present!
Looks like a regular, normal pen, right?
translation.ja: 普通のペンみたいでしょ

translation.en: -Mmm-hmm. -Wrong!
translation.ja: そうね このボタンを押すと レーザー殺人光線が

translation.en: Press this button and it's a laser death ray.
translation.ja: このボタンを押すと レーザー殺人光線が

translation.en: -[mimicking laser gun sounds] -[mock screams]
translation.ja: ピューン ピューン

translation.en: Oh, I love it, sweetie.
Dad, have you seen my journal?
On the window sill.
[Serena] Did you peek?
I swear on all the hobbits in the Shire, I didn't.
[Laura] Are you okay? Sweetie…
Oh, look, no glass. You're good. I'll fix it up, okay?
translation.ja: 破片はない　手当てしよう

translation.en: I love Jesse, but can we have something quieter?
translation.ja: ジェシーもいいけど 少し静かに

translation.en: [newscaster] The city in terror
translation.ja: 第４の犠牲者が出ました

translation.en: as the killer claims a fourth victim in a grim replay of…
translation.ja: 第４の犠牲者が出ました これまでと…

translation.en: Okay, who wants cake for breakfast, huh?
translation.ja: これまでと… そうだ ケーキ食べよう

translation.en: [Anya] My husband always was a passionate man.
A bastard and a criminal, but passionate. Five thousand.
translation.ja: 犯罪者で最低な男だけど… 約束の5,000ドル

translation.en: [Nico] Dangerous man like your husband, that's the rate.
-Two double cosmos. -[bartender] You got it!
translation.ja: ダブルコスモス 2 つ

translation.en: Make that one.
When I indulge, things tend to get a little, uh… unpredictable.
translation.ja: 飲みすぎると 行動が予測不能になるから

translation.en: Maybe I'm in the mood for unpredictable.
translation.ja: 私は予測不能って気分

translation.en: That's revenge talking.
[chuckles] You underestimate yourself.
Ah, it's a sin I've never been accused of.
-[Nico groans] -[chuckles]
Sing me the song again. About the umbrellas.
translation.ja: もう一度 歌って 雨傘の歌

translation.en: Yeah. Let's skip coffee and get right to the show tunes.
translation.ja: コーヒーは飲まずに 歌おうか

translation.en: Oh, please.
Could you hum me a few bars?
You don't remember?
It's the upside of being a blackout drunk. Less to regret.
translation.ja: 飲みすぎると記憶が消える

translation.en: Well, we'll make new memories, then.
Sounds good.
[Anya chuckles] You're a talented man.
Anya?
Don't worry, it's just my soon-to-be ex-husband.
translation.ja: 心配ないわ もうすぐ元夫になる男よ

translation.en: Yeah, I'm worried.
[man] Who's there?
Anya!
[newscaster] Tonight the city is bracing itself
after the body of another woman was found in a dumpster
translation.ja: 〝第五の犠牲者〞 リッチモンド区クラブ裏で― 〝第五の犠牲者〞

translation.en: behind a popular nightclub in the Richmond district.
translation.ja: 〝第五の犠牲者〞 別の遺体が発見されました 別の遺体が発見されました

translation.en: Authorities believe her to be the fifth victim of a killer stalking city streets.
translation.ja: 当局は 同じ犯人としています

translation.en: I saw her. I remember the skull on her t-shirt,
translation.ja: ドクロのTシャツ着てた

translation.en: in this club in the Richmond, uh, Park something.
No, Parade. Uh, something that begins with a P.
translation.ja: いや パレード？ Pで始まる名前

translation.en: I was there from, like, 11:00 to midnight.
[Laura] Is it the place? How do you pick them?
translation.ja: ここなの？ 犠牲者を選ぶ基準は？

translation.en: What's your pattern?
Sweetheart… -I'm so sorry. -Hmm.
translation.ja: かわいそうに なんてこと

translation.en: I know how much he meant to you.
[sobbing] Why do people have to die?
translation.ja: なぜ人は死んじゃうの？

translation.en: Sometimes… things just are, and they hurt.
translation.ja: 辛いけど 変えられないこともあるの

translation.en: There's a midnight vigil at his house.
translation.ja: 真夜中のお通夜がある

translation.en: I want to go with Ruby.
Let me talk to Dad, okay?
That's what you always say when it's a no.
Why can't I go?
[sighs] Because midnight is too late.
translation.ja: どうして？ 深夜は遅すぎるわ

translation.en: And Ruby… she's much older than you.
translation.ja: ルビーはずっと年上だから

translation.en: I understand this is hard.
You don't understand anything. You're the worst mom in the world.
translation.ja: わかるもんですか 最低の母親！

translation.en: You didn't even fix the camera yet, and if you hate Ruby, I hate you!
translation.ja: カメラも修理しない ルビーが憎いの？

translation.en: You can fix it? I know, it's super old.
[Mara] And then there were six.
[Laura] Do the cops have anything?
Just this in her pocket. [punches key]
translation.ja: 彼女のポケットにこれが

translation.en: Mara, we're nailing this guy.
translation.ja: マーラ 捕まえるわ

translation.en: Get me every witness, every police report, every scrap of CCTV.
translation.ja: 証人と警察の報告書 監視カメラの映像も押さえて

translation.en: I'll get us an hour on prime time on Tuesday with a call-in.
translation.ja: 火曜日に 視聴者からの電話も

translation.en: You think we can pull it together by then?
Do not let the witnesses talk to each other in the green room.
translation.ja: 目撃者同士を話させないで

translation.en: How you doing, sweetie?
Aaron, someone put a black tie on Ted. He looks like a Christmas tree.
translation.ja: 司会のネクタイを黒にして

translation.en: [Serena] Mom.
-Yes, Angel? -I miss Ruby.
translation.ja: ええ？ 宿題も終わったから

translation.en: I've been really good, and I've done all my homework.
Can I please go see her?
Let me talk to Dad about it.
-[Aaron] Laura… -Hmm. We're on in 60 seconds.
-Yes, we are. -[phone ringing]
Okay. Yes? Hello?
Hi, Barry. Yeah, I promised Serena
translation.ja: もしもし バリー マーラがセレーナを 連れて行くわ

translation.en: that Auntie Mara would walk her down, okay?
translation.ja: マーラがセレーナを 連れて行くわ

translation.en: And here she is.
-[Mara] Ready to go, beautiful? -Hi, Auntie Mara.
translation.ja: じゃ 行こうか？ マーラおばさん

translation.en: I've gotta work late, but I will come in and kiss you.
translation.ja: 後で おやすみのキスしに行くわ

translation.en: I never want you to kiss me again.
translation.ja: もうママのキスはいらない

translation.en: Well, I love you no matter what.
translation.ja: それでも愛してるから

translation.en: In five, four, three…
[Mara laughs] He's just over there. You guys going to have fun tonight?
-[Serena] Yeah. -[Mara] Okay.
All right. -[cell phone beeping] -Hey! -See you. -[beeping continues]
translation.ja: 今夜楽しんで　じゃあ

translation.en: What do you want from me? There is nothing left.
translation.ja: いい加減にしてちょうだい

translation.en: We have operators to take your calls,
and Captain Sarneau and her team here to follow up on every lead you give us.
translation.ja: サルノ警部のチームが 追跡します

translation.en: Captain Sarneau?
[Sarneau] Take a look at this sketch.
Caucasian male, brown hair, long face.
translation.ja: 白人男性 髪は茶色 面長

translation.en: Tighter on the sketch.
Yes?
Hi, it's Barry. I thought you were sending her out.
-I did, with Mara. -Not here yet.
translation.ja: マーラが いや　まだ

translation.en: [Laura] What?
Laura, I'm telling you, I don't see her.
There's somebody claiming to be the killer. Line two.
[Barry] Laura, are you there?
[man] Some crime stoppers you are.
You think you can catch me with that pathetic sketch?
I wish I was that good-looking.
How do we know you're who you say you are?
[man] News didn't mention the sapphire ring that I took from the second girl.
translation.ja: 盗った指輪は公表されてない

translation.en: I hope you're watching,
translation.ja: プライス検事 見てるか

translation.en: -District Attorney Price. -[gasps]
translation.ja: プライス検事 見てるか 私だけは死刑にできない

translation.en: Because I'm one criminal you'll never put on death row.
translation.ja: 私だけは死刑にできない

translation.en: Recognize this voice? Talk. Go on. Talk!
translation.ja: この声を聞けばな さあ 話せ

translation.en: [Serena] Mom! Mom! I'm scared!
translation.ja: ママ！ ママ！　怖い！

translation.en: -[man] Are you listening now? -[gasps] [man] I have your daughter.
translation.ja: 聞こえるか？ あんたの娘だ

translation.en: I better have your attention too. Everybody's attention.
translation.ja: 注目してもらいたいね 世間からも

translation.en: So much for the death penalty as a deterrent, Mr. Governor.
translation.ja: 抑制のための死刑か 知事さん

translation.en: Ready to have a child's blood on your hands?
translation.ja: 子供の血を見てからだ

translation.en: -Serena… -[Serena] Mommy!
-Serena? -Mom--
She was running to Barry in his car.
translation.ja: バリーの車に向かったから

translation.en: I'm so sorry, Laura.
I didn't know she was there.
Okay.
-There she is. -[gasps]
Where did she go?
Wait, stop. Go back.
Hold it. Hold it. Zoom in.
translation.ja: 一時停止して 拡大して

translation.en: I need to talk to him.
[man in studio] Clear to pair in five, four, three, two…
I don't know why you took my Serena.
Maybe, it's because you wanted to prove how foolish and arrogant I was
translation.ja: 私の愚かさを 証明するためかもしれない 捕まえられると思った傲慢(ごうまん)さ

translation.en: for thinking I could catch you.
translation.ja: 捕まえられると思った傲慢(ごうまん)さ

translation.en: I was. I know that now.
I'm talking to you… because you're somebody's son,
translation.ja: 話しかけている理由は あなたは誰かの息子

translation.en: maybe somebody's father.
And I'm begging you not to hurt her.
Have mercy on her.
Send her home safe and alive.
And if you can't… If you can't let go of your anger… take me.
translation.ja: もし できないなら 怒りが収まらないなら

translation.en: Do whatever you want with me.
Take me instead,
and just send Serena back to her father, who loves her.
translation.ja: セレーナは父親の元に返して

translation.en: I don't care about the governor, or the death penalty.
translation.ja: 知事とか死刑とか関係ない

translation.en: I just want my baby back. Please…
translation.ja: 娘を返してほしいだけ お願い

translation.en: Please…
[Governor DeKizer] This criminal announced his crime as a personal challenge to me.
translation.ja: 私への個人的な挑戦として 犯罪を表明しました

translation.en: And I vow, as a father, that I will rise to that challenge.
translation.ja: 父親として誓う 挑戦を受けて立つと

translation.en: I will see that this monster and all who take the lives of innocents
translation.ja: この怪物のように― 無実の人の命を奪えば 代償を払わせる

translation.en: pay the highest price.
translation.ja: 無実の人の命を奪えば 代償を払わせる

translation.en: These were found in her pockets. Do you recognize them?
translation.ja: 彼女のポケットにあったの

translation.en: Serena… She didn't draw that. [sputters] That's… Snakes and thorns…
translation.ja: セレーナじゃないわ ヘビといばら？

translation.en: She'll never draw anything like that.
translation.ja: そんなものは描かない

translation.en: [Sarneau] What about the safety pin? It was caught in her sweater.
translation.ja: セーターには安全ピンが

translation.en: [Laura] She wasn't wearing a safety pin last night.
translation.ja: ピンは身に着けてなかった

translation.en: [Sarneau] What about this?
What is that… Are those flowers?
They are Marsh Hairbell. They are found in swamps. Not around here.
translation.ja: 沼地のヘアベル この辺りにはない

translation.en: -They might help tell us where-- -[Laura] Wait. Toy car.
translation.ja: つまり… 待って おもちゃの車で遊ばない

translation.en: -She never plays with cars. -She hates all that.
translation.ja: おもちゃの車で遊ばない 嫌いだから

translation.en: It is tragic that they took the death of Serena Price,
translation.ja: 犠牲者は― 孫と同年齢の子供です

translation.en: a child, who could've been our own granddaughter,
translation.ja: セレーナ・プライスの 悲劇の死で―

translation.en: to end the foot dragging.
I am instructing the department of corrections,
to recommence executions effective immediately.
translation.ja: 死刑の再開を指示しました

translation.en: Through a careful process of discussion,
the first to be executed will be Daniel Jackson…
translation.ja: ダニエル ・ ジャクソン

translation.en: A heartbreaking scene today at Black Pine Cove,
translation.ja: ブラックパイン入り江で―

translation.en: where a local fisherman discovered the body of missing Serena Price,
translation.ja: セレーナ・プライスの遺体を 漁師が発見

translation.en: the daughter of District Attorney Tom Price.
The DA and his wife…
Your Daddy's going to heaven, sweetheart…
translation.ja: お父さんは天国に行くの

translation.en: and when he gets there… he'll have Serena to keep him company.
translation.ja: そこに行けば セレーナも一緒にいるわ

translation.en: There is no such place as heaven.
[sputters] So, Serena can't be there, which means she is here.
translation.ja: セレーナはここにいるわ

translation.en: [sputtering] She is right here. She is… she is right here.
translation.ja: ここにいる 彼女はここにいるの

translation.en: What are you doing?
I can't see them every day.
Then don't come in here.
These should go to children who are gonna use them.
You don't have the right to make the decision on your own.
-I can't do this the way you're doing it. -Your way is better?
translation.ja: 前に進まないと ひどい

translation.en: Three months…
Grieving time's up? Time to act like she never existed?
translation.ja: 娘がいなかったように 振る舞えと？

translation.en: Is that what you think I'm doing?
[voice breaking] Oh, how dare you!
Every time I look at you, I think--
That I sent Serena downstairs with my assistant
translation.ja: セレーナを人に任せたから

translation.en: when I knew there was a killer in the city, a killer my show is going after.
translation.ja: 殺人犯を追う番組に 夢中だったから

translation.en: That's not what I was going to say.
I thought I could carry you through this.
[voice breaking] I hoped we could carry each other, but we can't.
translation.ja: 一緒に乗り切れると思ったが ダメだ

translation.en: Mom…
[Grace crying] They're killing him at 7:00, in one hour,
translation.ja: 処刑は７時 あと1時間しかない

translation.en: Please come for Ruby.
translation.ja: ルビーのためにも来て

translation.en: No time to pick you up. I'll meet you there. [Grace] Bless you.
translation.ja: 時間がない 現地で直接会おう

translation.en: [Nico] Whoa, whoa. Okay.
[Rashed] My wife finally coughed up your name, Mr. Jackson.
translation.ja: 妻が白状した ジャクソンさん

translation.en: I envy you, my friend.
Today you will cross the veil and discover the answer to the great mystery.
translation.ja: お前は偉大なる謎を解くんだ

translation.en: Listen for one second. [grunts]
If you kill me, my mother loses two sons today. It'll do her in.
translation.ja: 今 俺を殺せば 母は同時に２人の息子を失う

translation.en: You wanna kill somebody's mother?
Everybody has a mother, and everybody dies.
translation.ja: 誰にも母がいて 誰もが死ぬ

translation.en: Mommy's coming, Angel.
translation.ja: セレーナ　待ってて

translation.en: You won't be alone anymore. It won't be cold.
[Tom and Serena] ♪ Happy birthday to you ♪
translation.ja: ハッピーバースデー    ツーユー

translation.en: ♪ Happy birthday to you ♪
translation.ja: ハッピーバースデー    ツーユー

translation.en: ♪ Happy birthday, dear Mommy ♪
translation.ja: ハッピーバースデー    ディア ママ

translation.en: ♪ Happy birthday to you ♪
translation.ja: ハッピーバースデー    ツーユー

translation.en: Looks like we really surprised her, huh?
Don't say anything until you blow the candles out, or the wish won't come true.
translation.ja: ろうそく消すまで 何も言わないで

translation.en: Is it really you?
Who else would it be?
Mommy, let go. You're hurting me.
translation.ja: ママ 放して 痛い

translation.en: Okay, uh, go get ready for school, honey.
translation.ja: そうだ 学校の準備して

translation.en: Isn't Mommy gonna blow out the candles?
She'll blow them out later. Off you go.
translation.ja: 後でね 早く準備を

translation.en: [Tom sighing] Hey, are you… Are you okay?
What happened to you? Did you walk through a sprinkler?
translation.ja: 何があった？ びしょ濡れだ

translation.en: It's impossible. She died.
-Who died? -Serena. We…
translation.ja: 誰が？ セレーナは私の誕生日の １週間後に溺死した

translation.en: She drowned on the 12th, the week after my birthday.
translation.ja: セレーナは私の誕生日の １週間後に溺死した

translation.en: [Serena] ♪ Seems like nothing ever changes ♪
♪ No, no, nothing ever changes ♪
translation.ja: ノー 何も変わらない

translation.en: ♪ Everything stays the same ♪
♪ Hey, everybody Everybody wanna have a good time ♪
translation.ja: みんな みんな   楽しみたい

translation.en: ♪ Hey, everybody Everybody wanna have a good time ♪
translation.ja: みんな みんな   楽しみたい

translation.en: ♪ Seems like nothing ever changes ♪
♪ No, no, nothing ever changes ♪
translation.ja: ノー 何も変わらない   すべてが同じ

translation.en: ♪ Everything stays the same ♪
translation.ja: ノー 何も変わらない   すべてが同じ ウーワ　オッオー

translation.en: ♪ Hey, everybody Wanna have a good time ♪
Whoever you are, whatever you are…
translation.ja: あなたが誰であっても

translation.en: thank you for giving me back my Serena.
translation.ja: 戻ってくれてありがとう

translation.en: Hey
Hey.
Wanna tell me about your swim?
Mom, Mom… Mommy, I got a present for you.
Looks like a regular, normal pen, right?
translation.ja: 普通のペンみたいでしょ

translation.en: Looks like a regular, normal pen, right?
translation.ja: 普通のペンみたいでしょ

translation.en: Wrong. Press this button and it's…
…a laser death ray. [mimicking laser gun sounds]
translation.ja: レーザー殺人光線が ピューン　ピューン

translation.en: It's… I love it.
Dad, have you seen my journal?
Uh, it's over on the window sill.
[Serena] Did you peek?
I swear on all the hobbits in the Shire, I didn't.
Stop! I'll get your journal.
No, you'll read it.
Go around the rug!
-Sweetie. -Come here.
Okay, no glass. I'll fix you up. I will be right back.
translation.ja: 破片はない　手当てしよう

translation.en: Everything's the same.
What are you talking about?
[newsreader] City in terror as the killer claims a fourth victim in a grim replay…
translation.ja: 第４の犠牲者が出ました これまでと…

translation.en: [newsreader] City in terror as the killer claims…
translation.ja: 第４の犠牲者が出ました

translation.en: …all-too-familiar scenario.
He's killing them.
It… it's all happening the same.
You will soon lose something more precious to you than anything in the world.
translation.ja: あなたは世界で 一番大切なものを失う

translation.en: That is your fate, written in stone a million years before you were born.
translation.ja: 100万年前から 決まっている運命

translation.en: Mom, why are you acting so weird today?
translation.ja: ママ 今日はなんだか変ね

translation.en: I am not going to let anybody hurt you this time.
I swear to you on my life. Nobody's going to hurt you.
translation.ja: 私の命にかけて誓う 絶対 守ってみせる

translation.en: Nobody's going to hurt you. No.
Fate is your enemy. You can't flee from her. The only way is to fight her head-on.
translation.ja: 運命は敵　逃れられない 戦うしか道はない

translation.en: Baby, this time I'll save you.
